projects.title: Supply Chain Analytics
projects.description: Explored HIV medication data shipped worldwide, uncovering patterns and trends over the years. Built Predictive model on 50k shipping records, optimizing routes and reducing transport costs by 12%.

projects.title: Sentiment Prediction Via Text Analytics
projects.description: Analyzed 15k Airline Tweets and developed NLP model with 76% accuracy to predict sentiment and understand public perception of airlines critical to improve their services and public outreach.

projects.title: Product Recommendation for E-commerce
projects.description: Developed recommender system using collaborative filtering for e-commerce store, improving recommendation accuracy by 30% and increasing user engagement. Implemented personalized suggestions, resulting in a 20% increase in conversion and enhanced customer satisfaction.

projects.title: Market Basket Analysis
projects.description: Implemented Apriori algorithm for grocery data, uncovering product associations that increased cross-sell opportunities by 25% and boosted promotional effectiveness by 15%.
